mapper.insert: insert into t_coupon_template (name, shop_number, source, target, goods, type, valid_start_time, valid_end_time, stock, receive_rule, consume_rule, status, create_time, update_time, del_flag) values (#{name}, #{shopNumber}, #{source}, #{target}, #{goods}, #{type}, #{validStartTime}, #{validEndTime}, #{stock}, #{receiveRule}, #{consumeRule}, #{status}, now(), now(), 0)
mapper.select: select id, name, shop_number, source, target, goods, type, valid_start_time, valid_end_time, stock, receive_rule, consume_rule, status, create_time, update_time, del_flag from t_coupon_template where shop_number = #{shopNumber} and id = #{couponTemplateId}

select id, name, shop_number, source, target, goods, type, valid_start_time, valid_end_time, stock, receive_rule, consume_rule, status, create_time, update_time, del_flag from t_coupon_template where id = #{couponTemplateId}
